column5: The plan was to get the wee Lilly out for her first ice fishing this Sunday. No daddy or mommy,just some poppy and Lilly time.This all she talked about all week. She must of phoned 4 times this week to make sure our fishing date was still happening. I was hopeing the weather was going to be nice and warm,but cold temps and high winds were called for. Well we got the cold,(that wasnt going to be a problem with the hub and heater.) The wind,well they were wrong,,,,,,,,AGAIN.  Out we head for a short walk on the hard water. She,s so helpful she even helped drag out the sled. Set up the hub and she says,it,s a play house. I couldnt stop laughing. Yes Lilly,it,s a play house.  Get everything set up,get seated and fire up the heater and finder. She says,you got a TV. Yes,it shows us the fish. Once it,s up and running,she asked where the fish are. So I try to explain the best I can to a 3 year old. Wow,she picked it up so fast. Theres your bait (move it up and down) and you see that line there? Thats a fish.. She looks down the hole,I dont see any fish.  We played the chase game. She loved it.    Time for some hot chocolate and tim bits.    And then it was back to more chasing the fish.    Fun morning and I could,nt stop laughing the whole time out.   She warmed this old poppys heart today.
Great lookin' kid Gramps...
Good on you Brian  I don't have a heater so I haven't been brave enough to get Lucas out on the ice with me, but he's all over chasing bluegills with grandpa in the summer.
Oh man, she's a cutie!!!   Looks like a fun time Brian.
Great now ya got me thinking how nice it would be to have a grandkid.Glad she could get out with poppy

Awesome you two had a great time!!  And I think  you were just as excited as she was to get out together because you mentioned it a few times when we were out on Friday!  I promised to take my 12 year old daughter out for perch on a weekday (good report card means day off school for some "real world education"), maybe we can hook up again for some perching with the kids?  Burt
Nothing better then that
What a cutie!
great stuff
Sounds like a great day B.  She's a little cutie pie!
very cute kid! Good job being a good poppy
Awesome Brian!  This is going to be a great spring for family fishing.  I'm gunna get mikes boys out for perch in the next few weeks..  4 and 6.  Should be fun!
Thats great Brian...er, I mean Poppy.
That is amazing! I have 7 of then but too young to take anywhere:( Two of the boys had a fun day fishing a pond, taking them out again. BTW, We get them when the parents have to go somewhere
Now that is a memory and what life is all about!  Frame that last pic!
COOLIO Brian……..good times!
Love the "reel" world education! Sounds like you had a blast..... and cute grand-kid!
That's great that you got your Grandaughter out for a day of fishing Brian !!
awesome! love the reports with kids!  Good stuff Poppy
Beautiful young girl Brian.Maybe in the next decade or so I will get a chance to share that GREAT moment bud.You must be proud.
I get so much enjoyment taking my son fishing. Grandkids must be 10x the fun.
Great stuff right there!!! She sure looked like she had a great time. It must've been great to be out on the ice just the two of you.
Way to go Papa Remember the day you took me fishin Grampa
Great stuff Brian!
